name: Global Time Tapestry
description: Global Time Tapestry is a web application that displays time across various time zones around the world.

name: DNS Checker Online
description: This nifty little web app lets you peek under the hood of any domain's DNS records. Whether you're troubleshooting, curious, or just love DNS (we won't judge), this tool's got you covered.

name: Password Generator
description: The website allow you to generate strong password.

name: Check IP Tools
description: The simple website allow you to check your Public IP

name: Year Progress Tracker
description: The simple web application that tracks the progress of the current year. It displays the percentage of the year that has passed, the current day of the year, and the current date.

name: Change SSH Port
description: Simple tools to change the SSH port on server using one command

name: Yourls using Bash Script
description: Simple Script allow you to short URL using command CLI

name: MarkDown Editor
description: This is a basic Markdown editor inspired by HackMD. It allows you to write and preview Markdown documents with various formatting options.
